meanings.definition: The bones in the foot between the ankle and the toes.
meanings.sent1: The metatarsi support the weight of the body when standing.
meanings.sent2: She felt pain in her metatarsi after a long walk.
meanings.sent3: The metatarsi decided to have a dance party without the toes.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as the metatarsi holding up the foot.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained how important it is to take care of your metatarsi.

meanings.definition: The region of the foot corresponding to the metatarsal bones.
meanings.sent1: He massaged her metatarsi to relieve the pain.
meanings.sent2: The ball of the foot is where the metatarsi are located.
meanings.sent3: The metatarsi area was ticklish, making her giggle uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The metatarsi region is like the foundation of a building, providing stability.
meanings.sent5: She painted her toenails to match the color of her metatarsi region.
